raw_body: SCHOKMAN – ANTHONY GODFREY FRANCIS (“Tony”/ Ex-Navy). At rest with Jesus. Loving son of Gerald (deceased) and Doreen (Australia), beloved husband of Jennifer (Rosy), loving father of Deborine (England) and Rehan (Australia), father-in-law of Kishan and Qontas, loving grandfather of Lindsay, Duane and Raphael, brother of Anneline, Patrick (Patty), late Douglas (Billy), Rita, Charmanine (Debbie) and Estella.
